snippet: East Baton Rouge Parish sheriff’s deputies left empty-handed after trying to get information about Louisiana State University’s search for a new president from university officials.
abstract: Louisiana Judge Janice Clark orders seizure of documents regarding Louisiana State University's search for new president after university officials refuse to release information to comply with earlier order.
lead_paragraph: East Baton Rouge Parish sheriff’s deputies left empty-handed after trying to get information about Louisiana State University’s search for a new president from university officials.

headline.main: Louisiana: Judge Orders Seizure of Papers in L.S.U. President Search
headline.print_headline:
Louisiana: Judge Orders Seizure
Of Papers in L.S.U. President Search
